entries: 自然的精魂在低語，產生以下效果之一：

items: 你創造小而無害的感官效果，可以預測你所在地點接下來24小時的天氣情況。這個效果可以是一個代表晴空的金球，一朵代表雨天的雲彩，代表雪日而飄飛的雪花等等。這個效果持續1個回合。
你可以立即讓一朵鮮花綻放，一顆種子破殼，一片葉蕾發芽。
你創造一個小而無害的即時感官效果，如落葉、微風、小動物的動靜或者臭鼬的微弱氣味。這個效果在5英尺立方的空間內起效。
你可以立即點亮或熄滅一根蠟燭、一把火炬或是一處小篝火。

spell.name: Earthquake

components.m: a pinch of dirt, a piece of rock, and a lump of clay

entries: You create a seismic disturbance at a point on the ground that you can see within range. For the duration, an intense tremor rips through the ground in a 100-foot-radius circle centered on that point and shakes creatures and structures in contact with the ground in that area.
The ground in the area becomes difficult terrain. Each creature on the ground that is concentrating must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature's concentration is broken.

When you cast this spell and at the end of each turn you spend concentrating on it, each creature on the ground in the area must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is knocked {@condition prone}.
This spell can have additional effects depending on the terrain in the area, as determined by the DM.

Fissures. Fissures open throughout the spell's area at the start of your next turn after you cast the spell. A total of {@dice 1d6} such fissures open in locations chosen by the DM. Each is {@dice 1d10} x 10 feet deep, 10 feet wide, and extends from one edge of the spell's area to the opposite side. A creature standing on a spot where a fissure opens must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or fall in. A creature that successfully saves moves with the fissure's edge as it opens.
A fissure that opens beneath a structure causes it to automatically collapse (see below).

Structures. The tremor deals 50 bludgeoning damage to any structure in contact with the ground in the area when you cast the spell and at the start of each of your turns until the spell ends. If a structure drops to 0 hit points, it collapses and potentially damages nearby creatures. A creature within half the distance of a structure's height must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature takes {@dice 5d6} bludgeoning damage, is knocked {@condition prone}, and is buried in the rubble, requiring a DC 20 Strength (Athletics) check as an action to escape. The DM can adjust the DC higher or lower, depending on the nature of the rubble. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and doesn't fall {@condition prone} or become buried.

spell.name: 魔能爆[Eldritch Blast]
entries: 一束爆發著能量的光線射向生物。通過一個遠程法術攻擊檢定，命中則目標受到 ({@dice 1d10}) force 傷害。
當你達到更高的等級，這個法術可以創造更多的射線：5級兩條，11級三條，17級四條。你可以決定這些射線是攻擊同一個目標還是不同的目標，每條射線都單獨做攻擊骰。

spell.name: 元素武器[Elemental Weapon]
entries: 你接觸的一把非魔法武器變成魔法武器。選擇以下一種傷害類型：強酸(acid)、寒冷(cold)、火焰(fire)、閃電(lightning)或雷鳴(thunder)。這把武器在攻擊檢定上獲得 +1 加值，在傷害上增加 + {@dice 1d4} 所選傷害類型的傷害。

entriesHigherLevel.name: 升環效果
entries: 當你使用 5 環或 6 環施放這個法術，攻擊加值變為 +2 ，額外傷害變為 {@dice 2d4} 。當你使用 7 環或更高法術位施放這個法術，攻擊加值變為 +3 ，額外傷害變為 {@dice 3d4}。

spell.name: 強化屬性[Enhance Ability]

components.m: 野獸的毛皮或羽毛

entries: 你接觸一個生物，用魔法強化其屬性。選擇下列效果之一，目標獲得效果直到法術結束。

entries.name: 熊之堅韌
entries: 目標在體質檢定上獲得優勢，同時獲得 {@dice 2d6} 臨時生命值，在法術結束後失去。

entries.name: 牛之力量
entries: 目標在力量檢定上獲得優勢，而且其負重翻倍。

entries.name: 貓之優雅
entries: 目標在敏捷檢定上獲得優勢，並且非{@condition 乏力[Incapacitated]}狀態下，不會受到 20 英尺以內墜落傷害。

entries.name: 鷹之威儀
entries: 目標在魅力檢定上獲得優勢。

entries.name: 狐之狡黠
entries: 目標在智力檢定上獲得優勢。

entries.name: 梟之睿智
entries: 目標在感知檢定上獲得優勢。

entriesHigherLevel.name: 升環效果
entries: 當你使用 3 環或更高法術位施放這個法術，每環節額外增加一個目標。

spell.name: 變巨/縮小術[Enlarge/Reduce]

components.m: 一撮鐵粉

entries: 你改變你看見的一個生物或物品的大小。選擇一個生物或一件沒有被穿戴或攜帶的物品，如果目標非自願，它可以通過一個體質豁免檢定，成功則法術無效。
如果目標是生物，它所穿戴和攜帶的物品的尺寸也跟著變化，任何脫離這個生物的物品，尺寸恢復正常大小。

entries.name: 變巨
entries: 目標體積變為兩倍，重量變為八倍。體型也會增長一級，比如中型變為大型。如果沒有足夠的空間容納目標，則生物或物品在有限空間下會盡可能地達到最大尺寸。目標在力量檢定和力量豁免上有優勢，直到法術結束。目標的武器也會隨之變大，使用這變大的武器攻擊時，額外造成 {@dice 1d4} 傷害。

entries.name: 縮小
entries: 目標體積變為一半，重量變為八分之一。體型也會縮小一級，比如中型變為小型。目標在力量檢定和力量豁免上有劣勢，直到法術結束。目標的武器也會隨之變小，使用這變小的武器攻擊時，減少 {@dice 1d4} 傷害，這不會使傷害低於 1 。

spell.name: 誘捕打擊[Ensnaring Strike]
entries: 在法術結束前，下次用武器攻擊一個生物，在攻擊點上會出現一團扭曲的多刺藤蔓。目標必須通過一個成功的力量豁免檢定，否則就會被魔法藤蔓變為{@condition 束縛[Restrained]}狀態，直到法術結束。大型或更大的生物在這個豁免上有優勢，如果豁免成功，藤蔓枯萎。
當被這個法術{@condition 束縛[Restrained]}，目標每個回合開始時受到 {@dice 1d6} 穿刺 (piercing) 傷害。被藤蔓{@condition 束縛[Restrained]}的生物或能夠接觸到它的生物，可以使用一個動作通過一個力量檢定對抗法術豁免 DC。成功則目標解除狀態。

entriesHigherLevel.name: 升環效果
entries: 當你使用 2 環或更高法術位施放這個法術，每環節增加 {@dice 1d6} 傷害。

spell.name: 糾纏術[Entangle]
entries: 選擇一處，其 20 英尺平方的范圍內長出雜草和葡萄藤，這片被植物覆蓋的區域變為困難地形。
在你施放法術時，這個區域的生物必須成功通過一次力量豁免，否則會因為這些纏繞的植物成為{@condition 束縛[Restrained]}狀態，直到法術結束。一個被這些植物{@condition 束縛[Restrained]}的生物可以使用一個動作通過力量檢定對抗法術豁免DC，成功則擺脫{@condition 束縛[Restrained]}。
法術結束時，這些魔法植物會枯萎掉。

spell.name: 注目術[Enthrall]
entries: 你編織了一段使人分心的文字，使得你選擇的一個你可看見的、可聽見你的生物通過一個感知豁免檢定。任何在這個豁免檢定上成功的生物都不會被{@condition 迷惑[Charmed]}，如果你或你的同伴正在和其戰鬥，則這個生物在這個豁免上有優勢。如果失敗，目標在察覺除你以外生物的感知（觀察）檢定上有劣勢，直到法術結束或目標不再聽得見你。如果你變為{@condition 乏力[Incapacitated]}狀態或不能再說話，這個法術結束。

spell.name: Etherealness
entries: You step into the border regions of the Ethereal Plane, in the area where it overlaps with your current plane. You remain in the Border Ethereal for the duration or until you use your action to dismiss the spell. During this time, you can move in any direction. If you move up or down, every foot of movement costs an extra foot. You can see and hear the plane you originated from, but everything there looks gray, and you can't see anything more than 60 feet away.

While on the Ethereal Plane, you can only affect and be affected by other creatures on that plane. Creatures that aren't on the Ethereal Plane can't perceive you and can't interact with you, unless a special ability or magic has given them the ability to do so.
You ignore all objects and effects that aren't on the Ethereal Plane, allowing you to move through objects you perceive on the plane you originated from.

When the spell ends, you immediately return to the plane you originated from in the spot you currently occupy. If you occupy the same spot as a solid object or creature when this happens, you are immediately shunted to the nearest unoccupied space that you can occupy and take force damage equal to twice the number of feet you are moved.
This spell has no effect if you cast it while you are on the Ethereal Plane or a plane that doesn't border it, such as one of the Outer Planes.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 8th level or higher, you can target up to three willing creatures (including you) for each slot level above 7th. The creatures must be within 10 feet of you when you cast the spell.

spell.name: Evard's Black Tentacles

components.m: a piece of tentacle from a giant octopus or a giant squid

entries: Squirming, ebony tentacles fill a 20-foot square on ground that you can see within range. For the duration, these tentacles turn the ground in the area into difficult terrain.

When a creature enters the affected area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, the creature must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take {@dice 3d6} bludgeoning damage and be {@condition restrained} by the tentacles until the spell ends. A creature that starts its turn in the area and is already {@condition restrained} by the tentacles takes {@dice 3d6} bludgeoning damage.
A creature {@condition restrained} by the tentacles can use its action to make a Strength or Dexterity check (its choice) against your spell save DC. On a success, it frees itself.

spell.name: 腳底摸油[Expeditious Retreat]
entries: 這個法術允許你以驚人的速度移動。當你施放法術，你每回合都可以使用一個附贈動作完成疾行動作，直到法術結束。

spell.name: Eyebite
entries: For the spell's duration, your eyes become an inky void imbued with dread power. One creature of your choice within 60 feet of you that you can see must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be affected by one of the following effects of your choice for the duration. On each of your turns until the spell ends, you can use your action to target another creature but can't target a creature again if it has succeeded on a saving throw against this casting of eyebite.

entries.name: Asleep
entries: The target falls {@condition unconscious}. It wakes up if it takes any damage or if another creature uses its action to shake the sleeper awake.

entries.name: Panicked
entries: The target is {@condition 恐慌[Frightened]} of you. On each of its turns, the {@condition 恐慌[Frightened]} creature must take the Dash action and move away from you by the safest and shortest available route, unless there is nowhere to move. If the target moves to a place at least 60 feet away from you where it can no longer see you, this effect ends.

entries.name: Sickened
entries: The target has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks. At the end of each of its turns, it can make another Wisdom saving throw. If it succeeds, the effect ends.

spell.name: Fabricate
entries: You convert raw materials into products of the same material. For example, you can fabricate a wooden bridge from a clump of trees, a rope from a patch of hemp, and clothes from flax or wool.

Choose raw materials that you can see within range. You can fabricate a Large or smaller object (contained within a 10-foot cube, or eight connected 5-foot cubes), given a sufficient quantity of raw material. If you are working with metal, stone, or another mineral substance, however, the fabricated object can be no larger than Medium (contained within a single 5-foot cube). The quality of objects made by the spell is commensurate with the quality of the raw materials.

Creatures or magic items can't be created or transmuted by this spell. You also can't use it to create items that ordinarily require a high degree of craftsmanship, such as jewelry, weapons, glass, or armor, unless you have proficiency with the type of artisan's tools used to craft such objects.

spell.name: 妖火[Faerie Fire]
entries: 在射程內的一個20 尺方內的每一件物體被藍、綠、或紫光包圍，色彩由你選擇。範圍內的任何生物如果敏捷豁免失敗的話也會被光圍繞。受術的物體和生物在時效內發出 10 尺半徑的微光。
受術者不能從{@condition 隱形[Invisible]}得益，而且當他們被攻擊時，只要攻擊者可以看見他，這次攻擊就帶有優勢。

spell.name: 虛假生命[False Life]

components.m: 1 小瓶酒或蒸餾酒精

entries: 你獲得死靈給予的額外生命力。法術持續時間內，你獲得 {@dice 1d4 + 4} 臨時生命。

entriesHigherLevel.name: 升環效果
entries: 當你使用 2 級或以上的法術位施展該法術，每環節額外增加 5 點臨時生命

spell.name: 恐懼術[Fear]

components.m: 1片白羽毛或母雞的心

entries: 你制造一個目標最懼怕的幻象。 30 尺內的所有生物必須通過一個感知豁免，否則會丟棄他所持有的物品並且在法術持續時間內變為{@condition 恐慌[Frightened]}狀態。
被法術所{@condition 恐慌[Frightened]}的目標在其行動輪內必須使用疾行動作來遠離施法者，逃到最安全的地方，除非他無路可逃。當目標逃到看不到施法者的地方時，目標可以進行感知豁免，如果豁免成功，則該目標的法術效果結束。

spell.name: 羽落術[Feather Fall]

time.condition: 在你或60呎之內的生物掉落時

components.m: 一根羽毛

entries: 選擇五個正在掉落的生物。所有生物在法術失效前落地都不會受到任何墜落傷害。落地後此法術會失效。

spell.name: Feeblemind

components.m: a handful of clay, crystal, glass, or mineral spheres

entries: You blast the mind of a creature that you can see within range, attempting to shatter its intellect and personality. The target takes {@dice 4d6} psychic damage and must make an Intelligence saving throw.

On a failed save, the creature's Intelligence and Charisma scores become 1. The creature can't cast spells, activate magic items, understand language, or communicate in any intelligible way. The creature can, however, identify its friends, follow them, and even protect them.
At the end of every 30 days, the creature can repeat its saving throw against this spell. If it succeeds on its saving throw, the spell ends.
The spell can also be ended by greater restoration, heal, or wish.

spell.name: 假死術[Feign Death]

components.m: 1把墓土

entries: 你觸摸一個自願生物，並將他變成死去一般僵硬。

在法術持續時間內，或你再次接觸目標消解該法術，目標的外在表象和死亡完全一致同時根據目標受到的其他法術來決定擁有的額外狀態。目標{@condition 盲目[Blinded]}同時{@condition 乏力[Incapacitated]}，移動速度降低為 0。目標對除了精神以外的所有傷害有抗性。如果施法時，目標有疾病或{@condition 中毒[Poisoned]}，在該法術持續時間內這些效果無效。

spell.name: 獲得魔寵[Find Familiar]

m.text: 價值 10 gp 的木炭、香以及香草，必須在黃銅盆中燒掉

entries: 你獲得魔寵的服務，一個有著你選擇的動物外貌的精魂：蝙蝠({@creature bat})、貓({@creature cat})、螃蟹({@creature crab})、青蛙（蟾蜍）({@creature frog})、獵鷹({@creature hawk})、蜥蜴({@creature lizard})、章魚({@creature octopus})、貓頭鷹({@creature owl})、毒蛇({@creature poisonous snake})、魚（食人魚）({@creature quipper})、老鼠({@creature rat})、烏鴉({@creature raven})、海馬({@creature sea horse})、蜘蛛({@creature spider})或鼬鼠({@creature weasel})。它出現在施法距離內未被佔據的空間，它有著選擇外形生物的特性，但他實際上是天界、精類或煉獄生物（由你選擇）而不是野獸。
你的魔寵獨立行動，但它總是遵循你的命令。在戰鬥中他投自己的先攻，同時在自己的回合內行動。魔寵無法攻擊，但是它能如常進行其他動作。
當魔寵的生命降為0時，它會消失，不會留下物理殘余，在你重新施展該法術後他會重新出現。
當你的魔寵在你周圍 100 尺時，你可以和他進行心靈交流。另外，以一個動作，你可以通過魔寵的感官視聽直到你下一個回合，同時獲得該魔寵的任意特殊感知能力。在此期間，你自己的感官無效你視為耳聾和目盲狀態。
以一個動作，你可以暫時的解散你的魔寵，它會進入一個小位面重新等待你的召喚。同時你也可以永久解散它。在暫時解散時，你可以以一個動作召喚它出現在 30 尺內任意未佔據的格子中。
你不能同時擁有 2 個或以上的魔寵，如果你已有魔寵在施展該法術，你則會使其獲得你選擇的新的形態（從以上列表選擇）。
最後，當你施展觸摸法術時，你的魔寵可以幫你傳遞法術。你的魔寵必須在你 100 尺以內，同時他必須有反應動作來傳遞法術。如果法術需要一個攻擊骰，你使用你自己的調整。

spell.name: 尋獲坐騎[Find Steed]
entries: 你召喚一只擁有超凡智力、力量和忠誠的坐騎，同時和它建立長期聯系。坐騎出現在施法范圍內未被佔據的空間內，坐騎的外形由你從以下形態中選擇：戰馬 ({@creature warhorse})、小馬({@creature pony})、駱駝({@creature camel})、麋鹿({@creature elk})或者獒犬({@creature mastiff})（你的dm可以允許你選擇其他可選的外形）。坐騎擁有你選擇的形態的特性，但他實際上是天界、精類或煉獄生物（由你選擇）而不是通常類型。另外，如果你的坐騎智力為 5 或以下，它的智力變為 6 ，同時能聽懂一種你所說的語言。
你的坐騎在戰鬥內外都能幫助你，你們之間的聯系讓你們人騎一體。當騎乘在你的魔法坐騎上時，所有你施展的只以你為目標法術同時也影響你的魔法坐騎。
當魔法坐騎的生命降為 0 時，它會消失，不會留下物理殘余，在你重新施展該法術後他會滿血重新出現。你也可以以一個動作解散你的魔法坐騎，使得它消失。
當坐騎在你周圍 1 裡之內，你可以和他進行心靈溝通。
你不能同時擁有1個以上的魔法坐騎，以一個動作你可以在任何時候將你的坐騎從你們的聯系中解放，使得它消失。

spell.name: 尋找陷阱[Find Traps]
entries: 你可以在你所可以看到的視線之中察覺到範圍內的陷阱。所有警報陷阱、守護結界、跟機械式陷阱都可以被察覺。
此法術無法偵測到天然的陷阱，例如洞、脆弱的地板、不穩的屋頂。你可以偵測到陷阱但是無法知道陷阱的危險程度跟它們的所在位子。

spell.name: Find the Path

m.text: a set of divinatory tools—such as bones, ivory sticks, cards, teeth, or carved runes—worth 100 gp and an object from the location you wish to find

entries: This spell allows you to find the shortest, most direct physical route to a specific fixed location that you are familiar with on the same plane of existence. If you name a destination on another plane of existence, a destination that moves (such as a mobile fortress), or a destination that isn't specific (such as "a green dragon's lair"), the spell fails.

For the duration, as long as you are on the same plane of existence as the destination, you know how far it is and in what direction it lies. While you are traveling there, whenever you are presented with a choice of paths along the way, you automatically determine which path is the shortest and most direct route (but not necessarily the safest route) to the destination.

spell.name: Finger of Death
entries: You send negative energy coursing through a creature that you can see within range, causing it searing pain. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. It takes {@dice 7d8+30} necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
A humanoid killed by this spell rises at the start of your next turn as a zombie that is permanently under your command, following your verbal orders to the best of its ability.

spell.name: 火焰箭[Fire Bolt]
entries: 你將一團火焰扔向射程內的一名生物或物體。對目標進行一次遠程法術攻擊。命中的話，目標受到 ({@dice 1d10}) fire 傷害。被此法術命中的會易燃物體會被點燃，只要它非被穿載著或攜帶著。
法術的傷害隨等級提升： 5級 ({@dice 2d10}), 11級 ({@dice 3d10}), 17級 ({@dice 4d10})。

spell.name: Fire Shield

components.m: a bit of phosphorus or a firefly

entries: Thin and wispy flames wreathe your body for the duration, shedding bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet. You can end the spell early by using an action to dismiss it.
The flames provide you with a warm shield or a chill shield, as you choose. The warm shield grants you resistance to cold damage, and the chill shield grants you resistance to fire damage.

In addition, whenever a creature within 5 feet of you hits you with a melee attack, the shield erupts with flame. The attacker takes {@dice 2d8} fire damage from a warm shield, or {@dice 2d8} cold damage from a cold shield.

spell.name: Fire Storm
entries: A storm made up of sheets of roaring flame appears in a location you choose within range. The area of the storm consists of up to ten 10-foot cubes, which you can arrange as you wish. Each cube must have at least one face adjacent to the face of another cube. Each creature in the area must make a Dexterity saving throw. It takes {@dice 7d10} fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
The fire damages objects in the area and ignites flammable objects that aren't being worn or carried. If you choose, plant life in the area is unaffected by this spell.

spell.name: 火球[Fireball]

components.m: 一小球蝙蝠糞和硫黃

entries: 一道亮光從你的指頭閃到射程內你所選的一點，伴著深沉的嗚響爆出火焰。以該點為中心的 20 尺球體內的每一名生物都要進行一次敏捷豁免。失敗的生物受到 {@dice 8d6} fire 傷害，成功的話受到一半傷害。
這火焰會繞過邊角。它會燃點範圍內非被穿載著或攜帶著的易燃物體。

entriesHigherLevel.name: 升環效果
entries: 當你使用 4 環或以上的法術位施放此法術時，每環節額外增加 {@dice 1d6} 傷害。

spell.name: 火焰刀[Flame Blade]

components.m: 漆樹葉

entries: 你在空著的手中喚起一把火焰刀。刀的形狀及大小類似於一把彎刀，在法術持續時間內存在。如果你放手，火焰刀會消失，但你可以用一個附加動作再次喚起它。
你可以用你的動作使用火焰刀發起近戰法術攻擊，命中後，目標受 {@dice 3d6} fire 傷害。
火焰刀發出10尺半徑的明亮光線及另外10尺的昏暗光線

entriesHigherLevel.name: 升環效果
entries: 當你使用 4 環或更高的法術位施展此法術時，每 2 環節傷害增加 {@dice 1d6} 。

spell.name: Flame Strike

components.m: pinch of sulfur

entries: A vertical column of divine fire roars down from the heavens in a location you specify. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius, 40-foot-high cylinder centered on a point within range must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@dice 4d6} fire damage and {@dice 4d6} radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the fire damage or the radiant damage (your choice) increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 5th.

spell.name: 烈焰法球[Flaming Sphere]

components.m: 一點獸脂、少許琉璜、一些鐵屑

entries: 一團 5 尺直徑的火球出現於你所選擇的射程內的一處閒置空間，持續到時效結束。任何在該球 5 尺內結束回合的生物都要進行一次敏捷豁免，失敗的話受到 {@dice 2d6} fire 傷害，成功的話一半傷害。
你可以用一個附贈動作將火球移動最遠 30 尺。如果你用它撞人，被撞的人必需立刻進行對火球的傷害的豁免，並且火球在今回合內不能繼續移動。
當你移動火球時，你可以控制它跨過最高 5 尺的障礙、跳過最闊 10 尺的坑。這火球會燃點非被穿載或攜帶著的易燃物體，它並發出 20 尺半徑的亮光及再延伸 20 尺的微光。

entriesHigherLevel.name: 升環效果
entries: 當你使用 3 環或以上的法術位施放此法術時，每環節增加 {@dice 1d6} 傷害。

spell.name: Flesh to Stone

components.m: a pinch of lime, water, and earth

entries: You attempt to turn one creature that you can see within range into stone. If the target's body is made of flesh, the creature must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, it is {@condition restrained} as its flesh begins to harden. On a successful save, the creature isn't affected.

A creature {@condition restrained} by this spell must make another Constitution saving throw at the end of each of its turns. If it successfully saves against this spell three times, the spell ends. If it fails its saves three times, it is turned to stone and subjected to the {@condition petrified} condition for the duration. The successes and failures don't need to be consecutive; keep track of both until the target collects three of a kind.
If the creature is physically broken while {@condition petrified}, it suffers from similar deformities if it reverts to its original state.
If you maintain your concentration on this spell for the entire possible duration, the creature is turned to stone until the effect is removed.

spell.name: 飛行[Fly]

components.m: 一根鳥羽

entries: 觸摸一名自願的生物。在時效內目標獲得 60 尺飛行速度。當法術結束時，如果目標在他的下回合開始時依然在空中並且無法保持滯空，他會立刻墜落。

entriesHigherLevel.name: 升環效果
entries: 當你使用 4 環或以上的法術位施放此法術時，每環節額外增加 1 名目標。

spell.name: 雲霧術[Fog Cloud]
entries: 你以射程內一點為中心制造出半徑 20 尺球體範圍的霧。霧氣可以越過拐角，並且它的範圍內重度遮蔽。它在法術持續時間內存在或直到一陣中等或更強的風（至少 10 英里每小時）吹散它。

entriesHigherLevel.name: 升環效果
entries: 當你使用第 2 環或以上來施此法術, 每環節增加 20 尺範圍。

spell.name: Forbiddance

m.text: a sprinkling of holy water, rare incense, and powdered ruby worth at least 1,000 gp

entries: You create a ward against magical travel that protects up to 40,000 square feet of floor space to a height of 30 feet above the floor. For the duration, creatures can't teleport into the area or use portals, such as those created by the gate spell, to enter the area. The spell proofs the area against planar travel, and therefore prevents creatures from accessing the area by way of the Astral Plane, Ethereal Plane, Feywild, Shadowfell, or the plane shift spell.

In addition, the spell damages types of creatures that you choose when you cast it. Choose one or more of the following: celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead. When a chosen creature enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, the creature takes {@dice 5d10} radiant or necrotic damage (your choice when you cast this spell).
When you cast this spell, you can designate a password. A creature that speaks the password as it enters the area takes no damage from the spell.

The spell's area can't overlap with the area of another forbiddance spell. If you cast forbiddance every day for 30 days in the same location, the spell lasts until it is dispelled, and the material components are consumed on the last casting.

spell.name: Forcecage

m.text: ruby dust worth 1,500 gp

entries: An immobile, invisible, cube-shaped prison composed of magical force springs into existence around an area you choose within range. The prison can be a cage or a solid box as you choose.
A prison in the shape of a cage can be up to 20 feet on a side and is made from 1/2-inch diameter bars spaced 1/2 inch apart.
A prison in the shape of a box can be up to 10 feet on a side, creating a solid barrier that prevents any matter from passing through it and blocking any spells cast into or out from the area.

When you cast the spell, any creature that is completely inside the cage's area is trapped. Creatures only partially within the area, or those too large to fit inside the area, are pushed away from the center of the area until they are completely outside the area.

A creature inside the cage can't leave it by nonmagical means. If the creature tries to use teleportation or interplanar travel to leave the cage, it must first make a Charisma saving throw. On a success, the creature can use that magic to exit the cage. On a failure, the creature can't exit the cage and wastes the use of the spell or effect. The cage also extends into the Ethereal Plane, blocking ethereal travel.
This spell can't be dispelled by dispel magic.

spell.name: Foresight

components.m: a hummingbird feather

entries: You touch a willing creature and bestow a limited ability to see into the immediate future. For the duration, the target can't be surprised and has advantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws. Additionally, other creatures have disadvantage on attack rolls against the target for the duration.
This spell immediately ends if you cast it again before its duration ends.

spell.name: Freedom of Movement

components.m: a leather strap, bound around the arm or a similar appendage

entries: You touch a willing creature. For the duration, the target's movement is unaffected by difficult terrain, and spells and other magical effects can neither reduce the target's speed nor cause the target to be {@condition paralyzed} or {@condition restrained}.

The target can also spend 5 feet of movement to automatically escape from nonmagical restraints, such as manacles or a creature that has it {@condition grappled}. Finally, being underwater imposes no penalties on the target's movement or attacks.

spell.name: 交友術[Friends]

components.m: 當施這法術時需要在臉上使用少許的化妝

entries: 在時效之內，當你需要做魅力檢定時你會有得到優勢只要他們是對你沒有敵意的生物。當時效結束後，那生物會發現你使用魔法來影響他而對你產生敵意。如果是慣性用暴力的生物則會直接攻擊你，其他的生物可能會用其他方式來報仇(由DM決定)。

spell.name: 氣化形體[Gaseous Form]

components.m: 一小片薄紗和一縷清煙

entries: 在法術持續時間內，你將一個你觸摸的自願生物連同他穿著和帶著的所有東西轉化為一團模糊的雲霧。當生物的生命值下降到 0 時法術結束。非實體的生物不受影響。
在這種形態下，目標唯一的行動方式就是以 10 尺的速度飛行。目標可以進入並停留在被一個生物佔據的空間。目標抵抗非魔法傷害並在進行力量、敏捷和體質豁免時有優勢。目標可以穿過小洞、狹縫、甚至小裂紋，但對它來說液體就像固體表面一樣。目標即使被{@condition 昏迷[Unconscious]}或者({@condition 乏力[Incapacitated]})的時候也不會墜落，並且懸停在空中。
在模糊的雲霧形態下，目標不能講話或操縱物品，同時它帶著或拿著的物品不會掉落，不能被使用，或者與之互動。目標不能攻擊或施法。

spell.name: Gate

m.text: a diamond worth at least 5,000 gp

entries: You conjure a portal linking an unoccupied space you can see within range to a precise location on a different plane of existence. The portal is a circular opening, which you can make 5 to 20 feet in diameter. You can orient the portal in any direction you choose. The portal lasts for the duration.

The portal has a front and a back on each plane where it appears. Travel through the portal is possible only by moving through its front. Anything that does so is instantly transported to the other plane, appearing in the unoccupied space nearest to the portal.
Deities and other planar rulers can prevent portals created by this spell from opening in their presence or anywhere within their domains.

When you cast this spell, you can speak the name of a specific creature (a pseudonym, title, or nickname doesn't work). If that creature is on a plane other than the one you are on, the portal opens in the named creature's immediate vicinity and draws the creature through it to the nearest unoccupied space on your side of the portal. You gain no special power over the creature, and it is free to act as the DM deems appropriate. It might leave, attack you, or help you.

spell.name: Geas
entries: You place a magical command on a creature that you can see within range, forcing it to carry out some service or refrain from some action or course of activity as you decide. If the creature can understand you, it must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition 迷惑[Charmed]} by you for the duration. While the creature is {@condition 迷惑[Charmed]} by you, it takes {@dice 5d10} psychic damage each time it acts in a manner directly counter to your instructions, but no more than once each day. A creature that can't understand you is unaffected by the spell.
You can issue any command you choose, short of an activity that would result in certain death. Should you issue a suicidal command, the spell ends.
You can end the spell early by using an action to dismiss it. A remove curse, greater restoration, or wish spell also ends it.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 7th or 8th level, the duration is 1 year. When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 9th level, the spell lasts until it is ended by one of the spells mentioned above.

spell.name: 遺體防腐[Gentle Repose]

components.m: 一撮鹽和屍體每只眼睛上放置的一枚法術持續時間內必須一直保留的銅幣

entries: 你觸摸一具屍體或其他遺骸。在法術持續時間內目標被保護免於腐爛並且不能變成不死生物。
此法術同樣能有效的延長復活目標的時間限制，因為受此法術影響下度過的時間不計入法術如死者復活的時間限制內。

spell.name: Giant Insect
entries: You transform up to ten centipedes, three spiders, five wasps, or one scorpion within range into giant versions of their natural forms for the duration. A centipede becomes a giant centipede, a spider becomes a giant spider, a wasp becomes a giant wasp, and a scorpion becomes a giant scorpion.
Each creature obeys your verbal commands, and in combat, they act on your turn each round. The DM has the statistics for these creatures and resolves their actions and movement.
A creature remains in its giant size for the duration, until it drops to 0 hit points, or until you use an action to dismiss the effect on it.
The DM might allow you to choose different targets. For example, if you transform a bee, its giant version might have the same statistics as a giant wasp.

spell.name: Glibness
entries: Until the spell ends, when you make a Charisma check, you can replace the number you roll with a 15. Additionally, no matter what you say, magic that would determine if you are telling the truth indicates that you are being truthful.

spell.name: Globe of Invulnerability

components.m: a glass or crystal bead that shatters when the spell ends

entries: An immobile, faintly shimmering barrier springs into existence in a 10-foot radius around you and remains for the duration.

Any spell of 5th level or lower cast from outside the barrier can't affect creatures or objects within it, even if the spell is cast using a higher level spell slot. Such a spell can target creatures and objects within the barrier, but the spell has no effect on them. Similarly, the area within the barrier is excluded from the areas affected by such spells.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the barrier blocks spells of one level higher for each slot level above 6th.

spell.name: 守衛結界[Glyph of Warding]

m.text: 法術消耗熏香和至少價值 200 gp 的鑽石粉

entries: 當你施放本法術時，你在一個表面（比如一個桌面或一塊地板或牆）上或在一個能被關閉以隱藏符紋的物體（比如一本書，一個卷軸或一個寶箱）裡刻畫一個傷害其他生物的符紋。如果你選擇一個表面，這個符紋可以覆蓋不超過10尺直徑的范圍。如果你選擇一個物體，那個物體必須保持它的位置；如果此物體移動距離你施放此法術的位置超過10尺，符紋被破壞且法術不被觸發的終止。
結界符紋幾乎是隱形的，需要一次成功的對抗你的施法豁免 DC 的智力（調查）檢定才能被發現。
你施法時設定結界符紋的觸發條件。對於刻畫在表面上的符紋，最典型的觸發條件包括觸摸或站立在符紋上，拿掉覆蓋在符紋上的物體，進入符紋一定距離，或者操作符紋所在的物體。對於刻在物體內部的符紋，最典型的觸發條件包括打開物體，進入物體一定距離，或者看到或閱讀這個符紋。一量符紋被觸發，此法術終止。
你可以進一步細化觸發條件，使法術只在特定的條件下或符合於身體特征（比如身高或體重）、生物種族（例如，結界可以被設定為影響異怪或卓爾）、或陣營時發動。你也可以設定生物不觸發結界符紋的條件，比如那些說出特定口令的人。
當你刻畫符紋時，選擇爆炸符文或一個法術符紋：

entries.name: 爆炸符文
entries: 當觸發時，此符紋以其為中心在一個20尺半徑球體范圍內爆發魔法能量。此球體范圍可擴散越過牆角。每個范圍內的生物必須進行敏捷豁免。生物豁免失敗受到 {@dice 5d8} 酸液(acid), 寒冷(cold), 火焰(fire), 閃電(lightning), 雷鳴(thunder) 傷害（當你制造符紋時指定），成功受半傷。

entries.name: 法術符文
entries: 你可以通過施放一個准備好的 3 環或更低環的法術作為制造符紋的一部分來儲存它。此法術必須以一個生物或一個范圍為目標。當用這種方式施放時儲存的法術不會立即生效。當符紋被觸發時，儲存的法術被施放。如果法術指向一個目標，它以觸發符紋的生物為目標。如果法術影響一個區域，區域以那個觸發的生物為中心。如果法術招喚敵對生物或制造有害物體或陷井，它們出現在盡可能靠近入侵者的地方並攻擊它。如果法術需要專注，它持續直到它的最大持續時間結束。

entriesHigherLevel.name: 升環效果
entries: 當你使用 4 環或更高環的法術位施展這個法術時，每環節一個爆炸符文的額外傷害增加 {@dice 1d8} 。如果你制造一個法術符文，你可以儲存任何與你施放守衛結界使用的法術位同環的法術。

spell.name: 神莓[Goodberry]

components.m: 一枝槲寄生

entries: 至多 10 個漿果出現在你手裡並在持續時間內被灌入了魔法。生物可以用它的動作吃下一個漿果。吃掉一個漿果恢復 1 點生命值，並且這個漿果提供足夠維持一個生物一天的營養。
這些漿果如果在法術施放的 24 小時內沒有被吃掉就會失效。

spell.name: Grasping Vine
entries: You conjure a vine that sprouts from the ground in an unoccupied space of your choice that you can see within range. When you cast this spell, you can direct the vine to lash out at a creature within 30 feet of it that you can see. That creature must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or be pulled 20 feet directly toward the vine.
Until the spell ends, you can direct the vine to lash out at the same creature or another one as a bonus action on each of your turns.

spell.name: 油膩術[Grease]

components.m: 一點豬皮或黃油

entries: 光滑的油脂覆蓋在以射程內 1 點為中心 10 尺平方的地上，在持續時間內把它變為困難地形。
當油脂出現的時候，每一個站在它的范圍內的生物必須成功通過敏捷豁免否則{@condition 倒地[Prone]}。進入這個區域或在裡面結束回合的生物也必須成功通過一次敏捷豁免否則{@condition 倒地[Prone]}。

spell.name: Greater Invisibility
entries: You or a creature you touch becomes {@condition invisible} until the spell ends. Anything the target is wearing or carrying is {@condition invisible} as long as it is on the target's person.

spell.name: Greater Restoration

m.text: diamond dust worth at least 100 gp, which the spell consumes

entries: You imbue a creature you touch with positive energy to undo a debilitating effect. You can reduce the target's {@condition exhaustion} level by one, or end one of the following effects on the target:

items: One effect that {@condition 迷惑[Charmed]} or {@condition petrified} the target
One curse, including the target's attunement to a cursed magic item
Any reduction to one of the target's ability scores
One effect reducing the target's hit point maximum

spell.name: Guardian of Faith
entries: A Large spectral guardian appears and hovers for the duration in an unoccupied space of your choice that you can see within range. The guardian occupies that space and is indistinct except for a gleaming sword and shield emblazoned with the symbol of your deity.

Any creature hostile to you that moves to a space within 10 feet of the guardian for the first time on a turn must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw. The creature takes 20 radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The guardian vanishes when it has dealt a total of 60 damage.

spell.name: Guards and Wards

m.text: burning incense, a small measure of brimstone and oil, a knotted string, a small amount of umber hulk blood, and a small silver rod worth at least 10 gp

entries: You create a ward that protects up to 2,500 square feet of floor space (an area 50 feet square, or one hundred 5-foot squares or twenty-five 10-foot squares). The warded area can be up to 20 feet tall, and shaped as you desire. You can ward several stories of a stronghold by dividing the area among them, as long as you can walk into each contiguous area while you are casting the spell.

When you cast this spell, you can specify individuals that are unaffected by any or all of the effects that you choose. You can also specify a password that, when spoken aloud, makes the speaker immune to these effects.
Guards and wards creates the following effects within the warded area.

entries.name: Corridors
entries: Fog fills all the warded corridors, making them heavily obscured. In addition, at each intersection or branching passage offering a choice of direction, there is a 50 percent chance that a creature other than you will believe it is going in the opposite direction from the one it chooses.

entries.name: Doors
entries: All doors in the warded area are magically locked, as if sealed by an arcane lock spell. In addition, you can cover up to ten doors with an illusion (equivalent to the illusory object function of the minor illusion spell) to make them appear as plain sections of wall.

entries.name: Stairs
entries: Webs fill all stairs in the warded area from top to bottom, as the web spell. These strands regrow in 10 minutes if they are burned or torn away while guards and wards lasts.

entries.name: Other Spell Effect
entries: You can place your choice of one of the following magical effects within the warded area of the stronghold.

items: Place dancing lights in four corridors. You can designate a simple program that the lights repeat as long as guards and wards lasts.
Place magic mouth in two locations.
Place stinking cloud in two locations. The vapors appear in the places you designate; they return within 10 minutes if dispersed by wind while guards and wards lasts.
Place a constant gust of wind in one corridor or room.
Place a suggestion in one location. You select an area of up to 5 feet square, and any creature that enters or passes through the area receives the suggestion mentally.

entries: The whole warded area radiates magic. A dispel magic cast on a specific effect, if successful, removes only that effect.
You can create a permanently guarded and warded structure by casting this spell there every day for one year.

spell.name: 指導[Guidance]
entries: 你觸摸一名自願的生物。在法術結束前限一次，目標可以骰一個 {@dice 1d4} 並將結果加到他所選的一項能力檢定上。他可以在投擲前或投擲後決定使用此能力。然後此法術會結束。

spell.name: 光導箭[Guiding Bolt]
entries: 一度光芒閃擊你所選的射程內的一名生物。對目標進行一次遠程法術攻擊。命中的話，目標受到 {@dice 4d6} radiant 傷害，而且到你的下回合結束前，拜殘留目標身上的微弱閃光所賜，下一次對目標進行的攻擊骰帶有優勢。

entriesHigherLevel.name: 升環效果
entries: 當你用 2 環或以上法的術位施放此法術時，每環節增加  {@dice 1d6} 傷害。

spell.name: 造風術[Gust of Wind]

components.m: 一粒豆科植物的種子

entries: 在法術持續時間內一道 60 尺長 10 尺寬的強風從你吹向你指定的方向。每一個在這條線上開始回合的生物必須通過力量豁免，否則沿著風向被推離你 15 尺。
任何在這條線上的生物向你移動時每移動 1 尺必須花費 2 尺移動力。
強風吹散毒氣或霧氣，並且它吹熄蠟燭、火把和其他范圍內類似的沒有保護的火焰。它引起有保護的火焰比如提燈劇烈搖晃並有 50% 的機率熄滅他們。
在法術終止前你的每一回合，都可以用一個附贈動作改變從你身上吹出去的風向。

spell.name: 棘雹術[Hail of Thorns]
entries: 在法術結束之前，當你的下一次遠程武器攻擊命中一個生物時，此法術會創造出一片棘刺之雨。棘刺從你的遠程武器或彈藥中生長出來。除了攻擊的正常效果之外，被攻擊的目標和目標 5 英尺內的所有生物必須進行一次敏捷豁免，若失敗則受到 {@dice 1d10} 穿刺 (piercing) 傷害，成功則傷害減半。

entriesHigherLevel.name: 升環效果
entries: 如果你使用 2 環或更高的法術位施展此法術，每環節提升 {@dice 1d10} 傷害 (最大 {@dice 6d10}).

spell.name: Hallow

m.text: herbs, oils, and incense worth at least 1,000 gp, which the spell consumes

entries: You touch a point and infuse an area around it with holy (or unholy) power. The area can have a radius up to 60 feet, and the spell fails if the radius includes an area already under the effect a hallow spell. The affected area is subject to the following effects.

First, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead can't enter the area, nor can such creatures charm, frighten, or possess creatures within it. Any creature {@condition 迷惑[Charmed]}, {@condition 恐慌[Frightened]}, or possessed by such a creature is no longer {@condition 迷惑[Charmed]}, {@condition 恐慌[Frightened]}, or possessed upon entering the area. You can exclude one or more of those types of creatures from this effect.

Second, you can bind an extra effect to the area. Choose the effect from the following list, or choose an effect offered by the DM. Some of these effects apply to creatures in the area; you can designate whether the effect applies to all creatures, creatures that follow a specific deity or leader, or creatures of a specific sort, such as orcs or trolls. When a creature that would be affected enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, it can make a Charisma saving throw. On a success, the creature ignores the extra effect until it leaves the area.

entries.name: Courage
entries: Affected creatures can't be {@condition 恐慌[Frightened]} while in the area.

entries.name: Darkness
entries: Darkness fills the area. Normal light, as well as magical light created by spells of a lower level than the slot you used to cast this spell, can't illuminate the area.

entries.name: Daylight
entries: Bright light fills the area. Magical darkness created by spells of a lower level than the slot you used to cast this spell can't extinguish the light.

entries.name: Energy Protection
entries: Affected creatures in the area have resistance to one damage type of your choice, except for bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing.

entries.name: Energy Vulnerability
entries: Affected creatures in the area have vulnerability to one damage type of your choice, except for bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing.

entries.name: Everlasting Rest
entries: Dead bodies interred in the area can't be turned into undead.

entries.name: Extradimensional Interference
entries: Affected creatures can't move or travel using teleportation or by extradimensional or interplanar means.

entries.name: Fear
entries: Affected creatures are {@condition 恐慌[Frightened]} while in the area.

entries.name: Silence
entries: No sound can emanate from within the area, and no sound can reach into it.

entries.name: Tongues
entries: Affected creatures can communicate with any other creature in the area, even if they don't share a common language.

spell.name: Hallucinatory Terrain

components.m: a stone, a twig, and a bit of green plant

entries: You make natural terrain in a 150-foot cube in range look, sound, and smell like some other sort of natural terrain. Thus, open fields or a road can be made to resemble a swamp, hill, crevasse, or some other difficult or impassable terrain. A pond can be made to seem like a grassy meadow, a precipice like a gentle slope, or a rock-strewn gully like a wide and smooth road. Manufactured structures, equipment, and creatures within the area aren't changed in appearance.

The tactile characteristics of the terrain are unchanged, so creatures entering the area are likely to see through the illusion. If the difference isn't obvious by touch, a creature carefully examining the illusion can attempt an Intelligence (Investigation) check against your spell save DC to disbelieve it. A creature who discerns the illusion for what it is, sees it as a vague image superimposed on the terrain.

spell.name: Harm
entries: You unleash a virulent disease on a creature that you can see within range. The target must make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, it takes {@dice 14d6} necrotic damage, or half as much damage on a successful save. The damage can't reduce the target's hit points below 1. If the target fails the saving throw, its hit point maximum is reduced for 1 hour by an amount equal to the necrotic damage it took. Any effect that removes a disease allows a creature's hit point maximum to return to normal before that time passes.

spell.name: 加速[Haste]

components.m: 一片甘草根

entries: 選擇射程內的一名自願目標。直到法術結束前，目標的速度翻倍、護甲等級 +2、敏捷豁免帶有優勢、並且在他的每個回合獲得一次額外動作。這動作只能用來攻擊（限一次武器攻擊）、疾走、撒離、躲藏、或使用物件。
當法術結束時，一度疲累感侵襲目標，目標直到他的下回合結束前都不能移動或動作。

spell.name: Heal
entries: Choose a creature that you can see within range. A surge of positive energy washes through the creature, causing it to regain 70 hit points. This spell also ends blindness, deafness, and any diseases affecting the target. This spell has no effect on constructs or undead.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 7th level or higher, the amount of healing increases by 10 for each slot level above 6th.

spell.name: 醫療真言[Healing Word]
entries: 選擇射程內你看得見的一名生物，他恢復 {@dice 1d4} + 你的施法能力調整值 的生命值。此法術對不死和構裝體無效。

entriesHigherLevel.name: 升環效果
entries: 當你用 2 環或以上的法術位施放此法術時，每環增加 {@dice 1d4} 恢復量。

spell.name: 灼熱金屬[Heat Metal]

components.m: 一片鐵片和一團火焰

entries: 選擇射程內你可見的一件加工過的金屬物體，例如一把金屬武器或者一套金屬重甲或中甲。你使該物體變得熾熱。當你施展此法術時任何與該物體有物理接觸的生物受到 {@dice 2d8} fire 傷害。直到法術結束前，在你後續的每個回合中，你都可以使用1個附贈動作再次造成此傷害。
如果握持或穿戴這件物體的生物因此受到傷害，該生物必須成功通過一次體質豁免，否則如果條件允許，它就會扔掉該物體。如果它沒有扔掉該物體，則直到你的下一回合開始為止，它在攻擊骰和能力檢定獲得劣勢。

entriesHigherLevel.name: 升環效果
entries: 當你使用 3 環或更高的法術位施展此法術時，每環節傷害增加 {@dice 1d8} 。

spell.name: 煉獄叱喝[Hellish Rebuke]

time.condition: 當你被 60 英尺內你可見的一個生物傷害時使用

entries: 你伸指一點，傷害你的生物立刻被煉獄烈焰包圍。該生物必須進行一次敏捷豁免，若失敗則受到 {@dice 2d10} fire 傷害，成功則傷害減半。

entriesHigherLevel.name: 升環效果
entries: 當你使用 2 環或更高的法術位施展此法術時，每環節增加 {@dice 1d10} 傷害。

spell.name: Heroes' Feast

m.text: a gem-encrusted bowl worth at least 1,000 gp, which the spell consumes

entries: You bring forth a great feast, including magnificent food and drink. The feast takes 1 hour to consume and disappears at the end of that time, and the beneficial effects don't set in until this hour is over. Up to twelve other creatures can partake of the feast.

A creature that partakes of the feast gains several benefits. The creature is cured of all diseases and poison, becomes immune to poison and being {@condition 恐慌[Frightened]}, and makes all Wisdom saving throws with advantage. Its hit point maximum also increases by {@dice 2d10}, and it gains the same number of hit points. These benefits last for 24 hours.

spell.name: 英雄氣概[Heroism]
entries: 一個自願生物經你接觸後充滿了勇氣。直到法術結束前，該生物免疫{@condition 恐慌[Frightened]}，並且在它的每回合開始時它獲得臨時生命，其數值等同於你的施法關鍵屬性調整值。當法術結束時，目標失去任何尚存的由此法術提供的臨時生命值。

entriesHigherLevel.name: 升環效果
entries: 當你使用 2 環或更高的法術位施展此法術時，每增加一環你就可以額外指定一個目標。

spell.name: 脆弱詛咒[Hex]

components.m: 一只被石化的蠑螈眼睛

entries: 你對射程內你可見的一個生物施加詛咒。直到法術結束前，無論何時，當你攻擊並擊中目標時＊，你對它額外造成 {@dice 1d6} necrotic 傷害。另外，當你施展此法術時選擇一項屬性，目標在由你選擇的屬性的屬性檢定中獲得劣勢。
如果目標在法術結束前生命降低至 0 ，你可以在法術結束前後續的某一回合中使用1個附贈動作詛咒另一個生物。
對目標施展的「移除詛咒」會提早終止此法術。
＊備註：豁免類與不需要命中判定的法術除外

entriesHigherLevel.name: 升環效果
entries: 當你使用 3 環或 4 環法術位施展此法術時，你可以維持對此法術的專注至多 8 小時。當你使用 5 環或更高的法術位施展此法術時，你可以維持對此法術的專注至多 24 小時。

spell.name: Hold Monster

components.m: a small, straight piece of iron

entries: Choose a creature that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} for the duration. This spell has no effect on undead. At the end of each of its turns, the target can make another Wisdom saving throw. On a success, the spell ends on the target.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 5th. The creatures must be within 30 feet of each other when you target them.

spell.name: 人類定身[Hold Person]

components.m: 一塊小小的筆直鐵塊

entries: 選擇你能看見的射程內的一名類人。目標需要通過一次感知豁免，否則會被{@condition 麻痺[Paralyzed]}到時效結束。在目標的每一回合結束時他都可以再次進行豁免。成功的話他身上的此法術結束。

entriesHigherLevel.name: 升環效果
entries: 當你用 3 環或以上的法術位施放此法術時，每環節增加一名目標。當你施法時，所有目標必需互相相距不超過 30 尺。

spell.name: Holy Aura

m.text: a tiny reliquary worth at least 1,000 gp containing a sacred relic, such as a scrap of cloth from a saint's robe or a piece of parchment from a religious text

entries: Divine light washes out from you and coalesces in a soft radiance in a 30-foot radius around you. Creatures of your choice in that radius when you cast this spell shed dim light in a 5-foot radius and have advantage on all saving throws, and other creatures have disadvantage on attack rolls against them until the spell ends. In addition, when a fiend or an undead hits an affected creature with a melee attack, the aura flashes with brilliant light. The attacker must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or be {@condition 盲目[Blinded]} until the spell ends.

spell.name: 哈達之欲[Hunger of Hadar]

components.m: 一條酸洗過的章魚觸手

entries: 你打開一個通道，通往群星間的黑暗之處，遍布未知的恐怖存在之地。以射程內一點為中心，一個半徑 20 英尺的黑暗寒冷的球形孔洞出現並持續到法術結束。這個虛無之洞充斥著 30 英尺內都能聽到的不和諧的耳語和啜哺咀嚼的噪音。光芒、魔法和其他手段都無法照亮這個區域，完全處於區域內的生物處於{@condition 盲目[Blinded]}狀態。
這個空洞將空間結構扭曲，區域內為困難地形。任何在區域內開始它的回合的生物受到 {@dice 2d6} cold 傷害。任何在區域內結束它的回合的生物必須成功通過一次敏捷豁免，否則會由於異界軟體觸手的觸碰而受到 {@dice 2d6} acid 傷害。

spell.name: 獵人印記[Hunter's Mark]
entries: 你選擇射程內你可見的一個生物並神秘地標記它為你的獵物。直到法術結束前，你每次以武器攻擊命中目標時都會額外造成 {@dice 1d6} 傷害，並且你在任何為尋找目標生物而進行的感知（察覺）和感知（生存）檢定中獲得優勢。如果在法術結束前目標生命降低至 0 ，則你可以在法術結束前的後續某一個回合中使用一個附贈動作標記另一個生物。

entriesHigherLevel.name: 升環效果
entries: 當你使用 3 環或 4 環法術位施展此法術時，你可以維持對此法術的專注至多 8 小時。當你使用 5 環或更高的法術位施展此法術時，你可以維持對此法術的專注至多 24 小時。

spell.name: 催眠圖紋[Hypnotic Pattern]

components.m: 一根點燃的熏香或一個裝有磷光材料的水晶小瓶

entries: 你在射程內邊長 30 英尺的立方體范圍內創造出不斷穿梭往返的五顏六色的旋轉圖案。圖案閃爍不定若隱若現，區域內每個看到圖案的生物都必須進行一次感知豁免，失敗則在法術持續時間內被{@condition 迷惑[Charmed]}。當被此法術{@condition 迷惑[Charmed]}時，目標生物處於{@condition 乏力[Incapacitated]}狀態並且速度為 0 。
若受影響的生物受到任何傷害，或者他人將其從恍惚中搖醒，則該生物身上的法術效果結束。

spell.name: Ice Storm

components.m: a pinch of dust and a few drops of water

entries: A hail of rock-hard ice pounds to the ground in a 20-foot-radius, 40-foot-high cylinder centered on a point within range. Each creature in the cylinder must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@dice 2d8} bludgeoning damage and {@dice 4d6} cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
Hailstones turn the storm's area of effect into difficult terrain until the end of your next turn.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, the bludgeoning damage increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 4th.

spell.name: 鑑定[Identify]

m.text: 價值最少100gp 的珍珠，及一根梟羽

entries: 選擇一件物體﹐你必需在施展法術的期間一直摸著它。如果它是一件魔法物品或者被灌注了魔法，你知曉它的特性、如何使用它、它需不需要同調、及它有多少充能（如有）。你知道現在有沒有法術在它身上起效，如有的話知道是甚麼法術。如果它是用法術所做的，你也知道那是甚麼法術。
如果你在施法期間觸摸一名生物，了解當前正在影響它的法術（如果有的話）。

spell.name: 迷幻手稿[Illusory Script]

m.text: 以鉛為原料的墨水，價值至少10gp，法術會消耗這些材料

entries: 你在羊皮紙、紙或是其他適合書寫的材質上書寫文字並對其施加一個強力的幻象，持續直到法術結束。
對於你和你施法時指定的任何生物，該文件看起來完全正常，是你的筆跡，並正常傳達你寫下手稿時想要傳達的一切意義。對於所有其他閱讀者，該文件看起來就像是用莫名其妙的未知或魔法方式書寫的。或者，你可以使該文件呈現出完全不同的信息，看起來是用另一種筆跡或者語言書寫的，但這種語言必須是你懂得的。
如果法術被解除，則幻象和原始手稿一同消失不見。
擁有真實視覺的生物可以讀出被隱藏的信息。

spell.name: Imprisonment

m.text: a vellum depiction or a carved statuette in the likeness of the target, and a special component that varies according to the version of the spell you choose, worth at least 500 gp per Hit Die of the target

entries: You create a magical restraint to hold a creature that you can see within range. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be bound by the spell; if it succeeds, it is immune to this spell if you cast it again. While affected by this spell, the creature doesn't need to breathe, eat, or drink, and it doesn't age. Divination spells can't locate or perceive the target.
When you cast the spell, you choose one of the following forms of imprisonment.

entries.name: Burial
entries: The target is entombed far beneath the earth in a sphere of magical force that is just large enough to contain the target. Nothing can pass through the sphere, nor can any creature teleport or use planar travel to get into or out of it.
The special component for this version of the spell is a small mithral orb.

entries.name: Chaining
entries: Heavy chains, firmly rooted in the ground, hold the target in place. The target is {@condition restrained} until the spell ends, and it can't move or be moved by any means until then.
The special component for this version of the spell is a fine chain of precious metal.

entries.name: Hedged Prison
entries: The spell transports the target into a tiny demiplane that is warded against teleportation and planar travel. The demiplane can be a labyrinth, a cage, a tower, or any similar confined structure or area of your choice.
The special component for this version of the spell is a miniature representation of the prison made from jade.

entries.name: Minimus Containment
entries: The target shrinks to a height of 1 inch and is imprisoned inside a gemstone or similar object. Light can pass through the gemstone normally (allowing the target to see out and other creatures to see in), but nothing else can pass through, even by means of teleportation or planar travel. The gemstone can't be cut or broken while the spell remains in effect.
The special component for this version of the spell is a large, transparent gemstone, such as a corundum, diamond, or ruby.

entries.name: Slumber
entries: The target falls asleep and can't be awoken.
The special component for this version of the spell consists of rare soporific herbs.

entries.name: Ending the Spell
entries: During the casting of the spell, in any of its versions, you can specify a condition that will cause the spell to end and release the target. The condition can be as specific or as elaborate as you choose, but the DM must agree that the condition is reasonable and has a likelihood of coming to pass. The conditions can be based on a creature's name, identity, or deity but otherwise must be based on observable actions or qualities and not based on intangibles such as level, class, or hit points.
A dispel magic spell can end the spell only if it is cast as a 9th-level spell, targeting either the prison or the special component used to create it.

You can use a particular special component to create only one prison at a time. If you cast the spell again using the same component, the target of the first casting is immediately freed from its binding.

spell.name: Incendiary Cloud
entries: A swirling cloud of smoke shot through with white-hot embers appears in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point within range. The cloud spreads around corners and is heavily obscured. It lasts for the duration or until a wind of moderate or greater speed (at least 10 miles per hour) disperses it.

When the cloud appears, each creature in it must make a Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes {@dice 10d8} fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature must also make this saving throw when it enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there.
The cloud moves 10 feet directly away from you in a direction that you choose at the start of each of your turns.

spell.name: 造成傷勢[Inflict Wounds]
entries: 你對你能看見的觸及內的一名生物進行一次近戰法術攻擊。命中的話，他受到 {@dice 3d10} necrotic 傷害。

entriesHigherLevel.name: 升環效果
entries: 當你用 2 環或以上的法術位施放此法術時，每環節增加 {@dice 1d10} 傷害。

spell.name: Insect Plague

components.m: a few grains of sugar, some kernels of grain, and a smear of fat

entries: Swarming, biting locusts fill a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point you choose within range. The sphere spreads around corners. The sphere remains for the duration, and its area is lightly obscured. The sphere's area is difficult terrain.

When the area appears, each creature in it must make a Constitution saving throw. A creature takes {@dice 4d10} piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature must also make this saving throw when it enters the spell's area for the first time on a turn or ends its turn there.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d10} for each slot level above 5th.

spell.name: 隱身[Invisibility]

components.m: 被阿拉伯樹膠包著的一根眼睫毛

entries: 你所觸摸的一名自願生物{@condition 隱形[Invisible]}，直到法術終結。目標在穿載著或攜帶著的所有東西也保持{@condition 隱形[Invisible]}直到不再在他身上。如果目標作出攻擊或者施展法術，此法術會終結。

entriesHigherLevel.name: 升環效果
entries: 當你用 3 環或以上的法術位施放此法術時，每環節增加一名目標。

spell.name: 跳躍術[Jump]

components.m: 一隻蚱蜢的後腿

entries: 你接觸一個生物。直到法術結束前，該生物的跳躍距離增至 3 倍。

spell.name: 解鎖[Knock]
entries: 選擇範圍內的一件物體。它可以是一度門、一個盒、一個箱、一套撩拷、一個鎖，或其他以普通或魔法方式阻止通行的物體。
被普通鎖鎖著或者普通地卡著的物體立刻解鎖或解開。如果目標有多個鎖，只有其中一個會解開。
如果你選擇的目標被魔法鎖術封鎖，這法術會壓制那法術 10 分鐘，期間目標可以如常地被打開或關閉。
當你施展此術時，目標會發出一度 300 尺內可聞的響亮敲擊聲。

spell.name: Legend Lore

m.text: incense worth at least 250 gp, which the spell consumes, and four ivory strips worth at least 50 gp each

entries: Name or describe a person, place, or object. The spell brings to your mind a brief summary of the significant lore about the thing you named. The lore might consist of current tales, forgotten stories, or even secret lore that has never been widely known. If the thing you named isn't of legendary importance, you gain no information. The more information you already have about the thing, the more precise and detailed the information you receive is.

The information you learn is accurate but might be couched in figurative language. For example, if you have a mysterious magic axe on hand, the spell might yield this information: "Woe to the evildoer whose hand touches the axe, for even the haft slices the hand of the evil ones. Only a true Child of Stone, lover and beloved of Moradin, may awaken the true powers of the axe, and only with the sacred word Rudnogg on the lips."

spell.name: Leomund's Secret Chest

m.text: an exquisite chest, 3 feet by 2 feet by 2 feet, constructed from rare materials worth at least 5,000 gp, and a Tiny replica made from the same materials worth at least 50 gp

entries: You hide a chest, and all its contents, on the Ethereal Plane. You must touch the chest and the miniature replica that serves as a material component for the spell. The chest can contain up to 12 cubic feet of nonliving material (3 feet by 2 feet by 2 feet).

While the chest remains on the Ethereal Plane, you can use an action and touch the replica to recall the chest. It appears in an unoccupied space on the ground within 5 feet of you. You can send the chest back to the Ethereal Plane by using an action and touching both the chest and the replica.

After 60 days, there is a cumulative 5 percent chance per day that the spell's effect ends. This effect ends if you cast this spell again, if the smaller replica chest is destroyed, or if you choose to end the spell as an action. If the spell ends and the larger chest is on the Ethereal Plane, it is irretrievably lost.

spell.name: 李歐蒙小屋[Leomund's Tiny Hut]

components.m: 一個小水晶珠子

entries: 一個半徑 10 英尺的不可移動的半球形力場出現在你周圍和上方，並且在法術持續時間內保持固定。若你離開這片區域則法術結束。
半球可以容納你和 9 個中體型或更小的生物。若法術區域內容納了一個體型更大的生物或者容納了不含你的 9 個以上生物 ，則法術失效。當你施展此法術時即處於半球內的生物和物體可以自由進出此半球。所有其他生物和物體都被阻擋，無法進出。法術和其他魔法效果既無法延伸至穿過半球，也無法直接穿過半球施放。半球內的空氣干爽舒適，無論外側氣候如何。
直到法術結束前，你可以控制半球內的亮度至微光或黑暗。半球從外側看是不透明的，並且呈現出由你選定的顏色，但從內側看它是透明的。

spell.name: 次級復原[Lesser Restoration]
entries: 你觸摸一名目標，並能終結正在影響他的一項疾病或狀態。狀態可以是{@condition 盲目[Blinded]}、{@condition 耳聾[Deafened]}、{@condition 麻痺[Paralyzed]}、{@condition 中毒[Poisoned]}。

spell.name: 浮空[Levitate]

components.m: 一個小皮圈或者一根紐曲成杯型的金絲

entries: 你所選的射程內的一名生物或物體垂直升起最多 20 尺，浮在空中直到時效結束。此法術能舉起最重 500 磅的目標。非自願的生物只要成功通過體質豁免則不受影響。
目標只能靠推拉觸及內的物體或表面，例如牆或天花，才能好像攀爬一樣移動。你可以在你的回合中改變目標的高度最多 20 尺。如果目標是你自己，你可以用你的移動力去升降。否則，你需要用你的動作移動目標，目標也必需保持在射程之內。
當法術終結時，如果目標依然在漂浮，他會輕柔地著地。

spell.name: 亮光[Light]

components.m: 一隻螢火蟲或一塊螢光青苔

entries: 你觸摸一件物體，其任何一面都不能大於 10 尺。直到法術結束前，它發出 20 尺半徑的亮光以及再延伸 20 尺的微光。亮光的色彩隨你喜歡。用遮光物完全覆蓋物件可以阻擋它的光。此法術持續到你再度施展這項法術，或者到你用一次動作解散此法術。
如果你以敵對生物穿載或攜帶中的一件物體作目標，他必需通過一次敏捷檢定才能避開這法術。

spell.name: 閃電箭[Lightning Arrow]
entries: 在法術持續時間內，當你下一次進行遠程武器攻擊時，該武器的彈藥，或者該武器本身（如果該武器是投擲武器），變為一束閃電。正常擲攻擊骰，若該攻擊命中則目標受到 {@dice 4d8} lightning 傷害，若未命中則傷害減半。此閃電傷害代替了武器的正常傷害。
無論你的攻擊是否命中，目標周圍 10 英尺範圍內的每個生物都必須進行一次敏捷豁免，若失敗則受到 {@dice 2d8} lightning 傷害，成功則傷害減半。
在此之後該彈藥或武器變回它的正常形態。

entriesHigherLevel.name: 升環效果
entries: 當你使用 4 環或更高的法術位施展此法術時，每環節都使上述兩種閃電傷害額外增加 {@dice 1d8} 。

spell.name: 閃電箭[Lightning Bolt]

components.m: 一點皮毛和一根琥珀、水晶、或玻璃杖

entries: 一道 100 尺長、5 尺闊的閃電從你開始往你所選的方向打出。每一名線上的生物都要進行一次敏捷豁免。失敗的生物承受 {@dice 8d6} lightning 傷害，成功的話一半傷害。
這閃電會點燃範圍內未被穿載或攜帶的易燃物體。

entriesHigherLevel.name: 升環效果
entries: 當你用 4 環或以上的法術位施放此法術時，每環節額外增加 {@dice 1d6} 傷害。

spell.name: 動植物定位術[Locate Animals or Plants]

components.m: 一塊尋血獵犬的皮毛

entries: 描述一種獸類或植物，或者說出這類生物的名字。你專注於附近的自然之音，如果 5 英裡內存在該類生物，你會得知其中距你最近的一個個體的方向和距離。

spell.name: Locate Creature

components.m: a bit of fur from a bloodhound

entries: Describe or name a creature that is familiar to you. You sense the direction to the creature's location, as long as that creature is within 1,000 feet of you. If the creature is moving, you know the direction of its movement.

The spell can locate a specific creature known to you, or the nearest creature of a specific kind (such as a human or a unicorn), so long as you have seen such a creature up close—within 30 feet—at least once. If the creature you described or named is in a different form, such as being under the effects of a polymorph spell, this spell doesn't locate the creature.
This spell can't locate a creature if running water at least 10 feet wide blocks a direct path between you and the creature.

spell.name: 物品定位術[Locate Object]

components.m: 一根分叉的樹枝

entries: 描述一件你熟悉的物體，或說出它的名字。只要該物體距你 1000 英尺以內，你就會感知到該生物的方向。如果該物體正在移動，你知曉其移動的方向。
此法術可以定位一件你已知的特定物體，只要你曾經至少一次在 30 英尺內近距離看到過該物體。或者，此法術可以定位特定的一類物體（例如某一種服裝、珠寶、家具、工具或武器）中距你最近的一個個體。
如果有任意厚度的鉛，即使只是薄薄一片鉛片，擋住了你與被定位的物體間的通路，則此法術無法定位該物體。

spell.name: 大步奔行[Longstrider]

components.m: 一撮泥土

entries: 你接觸一個生物，直到法術結束前，目標的速度增加 10 英尺。

entriesHigherLevel.name: 升環效果
entries: 當你使用 2 環或更高的法術位施展此法術時，每環都使你可以額外選擇一個目標。

spell.name: 法師護甲[Mage Armor]

components.m: 一塊揉製過的皮革

entries: 你觸摸一名沒有穿載護甲的自願目標，一道魔法力量圍繞目標的身體直到法術終結。他的護甲變成 AC 13 + 他的敏捷調整值。如果目標穿上護甲或者如果你以一次動作解除法術的話此法術會終結。

spell.name: 法師之手[Mage Hand]
entries: 一隻浮空的手在你所指定的射程內的一處出現。它持續到時效結束或到你用一次動作解散它。如果它在任何時候遠離你超過 30 尺或者如果你再次施展此法術，它也會消失。
你可以用你的動作控制這隻手。你可以用它操作物體、打開沒鎖上的門箱、從已經打開的容器中拿出或放置物件、或倒出瓶子裡的東西。每當你使用它時你可以移動它最遠 30 尺。
這隻手不能攻擊、使用魔法物品、或乘載大於10 磅的負重。

spell.name: 召喚法陣[Magic Circle]

m.text: 聖水或銀粉和鐵粉，價值至少100gp，法術會消耗這些材料

entries: 你在射程內的地面上一點創造了一個 10 英尺半徑、 20 英尺高的魔法能量圓柱。圓柱和地面或其他平面的交界處有符文在閃閃發光。
選擇以下生物類型中的一種或多種：天界生物、元素、精類、邪魔或不死生物。法陣會對被選擇的生物類型產生以下效果：

items: 該類生物不能通過非魔法手段主動進入圓柱區域。如果該類生物試圖使用傳送或位面旅行進入此區域，它必須先成功通過一次魅力豁免。
該類生物對圓柱區域內的生物進行攻擊時，其攻擊骰獲得劣勢。
圓柱區域內的目標不會被該類生物{@condition 迷惑[Charmed]}、{@condition 恐慌[Frightened]}或附身。

entries: 當你施展此法術時，你可以選擇讓魔力作用於相反的方向來阻止特定類別生物離開圓柱區域，並保護區域外的目標。

entriesHigherLevel.name: 升環效果
entries: 當你使用 4 環或更高的法術位施展此法術時，每環節使持續時間額外增加 1 小時。

spell.name: Magic Jar

m.text: a gem, crystal, reliquary, or some other ornamental container worth at least 500 gp

entries: Your body falls into a catatonic state as your soul leaves it and enters the container you used for the spell's material component. While your soul inhabits the container, you are aware of your surroundings as if you were in the container's space. You can't move or use reactions. The only action you can take is to project your soul up to 100 feet out of the container, either returning to your living body (and ending the spell) or attempting to possess a humanoids body.

You can attempt to possess any humanoid within 100 feet of you that you can see (creatures warded by a protection from evil and good or magic circle spell can't be possessed). The target must make a Charisma saving throw. On a failure, your soul moves into the target's body, and the target's soul becomes trapped in the container. On a success, the target resists your efforts to possess it, and you can't attempt to possess it again for 24 hours.

Once you possess a creature's body, you control it. Your game statistics are replaced by the statistics of the creature, though you retain your alignment and your Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores. You retain the benefit of your own class features. If the target has any class levels, you can't use any of its class features.
Meanwhile, the possessed creature's soul can perceive from the container using its own senses, but it can't move or take actions at all.

While possessing a body, you can use your action to return from the host body to the container if it is within 100 feet of you, returning the host creature's soul to its body. If the host body dies while you're in it, the creature dies, and you must make a Charisma saving throw against your own spellcasting DC. On a success, you return to the container if it is within 100 feet of you. Otherwise, you die.

If the container is destroyed or the spell ends, your soul immediately returns to your body. If your body is more than 100 feet away from you or if your body is dead when you attempt to return to it, you die. If another creature's soul is in the container when it is destroyed, the creature's soul returns to its body if the body is alive and within 100 feet. Otherwise, that creature dies.
When the spell ends, the container is destroyed.

spell.name: 魔法飛彈[Magic Missile]
entries: 你造出 3 支發光的魔法箭。每支箭分別射中你所選的射程內你能看見的生物，每支箭為 {@dice 1d4+1} force 傷害。這些箭會同一時間命中，你可以控制它們集中攻擊同一名生物或分散攻擊多名生物。

entriesHigherLevel.name: 升環效果
entries: 當你用 2 環或以上的法術位施放此法術時，每環節增加 1 支箭。

spell.name: 魔嘴術[Magic Mouth]

m.text: 一小塊蜂窩和翡翠粉，價值至少10gp，法術會消耗這些材料

entries: 你將一段信息植入射程內的一個物體中，當滿足預設的條件時，信息會被說出。首先你選擇一個你可見且未被另一個生物穿戴或攜帶的物體。然後說出一段信息，該信息不能超過 25 個字，你最多可以花 10 分鐘來傳達完這段信息。最後設定用來觸發法術傳達信息的事件。
當預設的事件發生時，目標物體上會出現一張有魔力的嘴，它會用與你相同的聲音和音量復述出存儲的信息。如果你選擇的目標本身有一張嘴或者嘴的類似物（例如雕像的嘴），則這張有魔力的嘴會出現在物體本身的嘴的位置，看起來如同是物體的嘴在說話一般。當你施展此法術時，你可以讓法術在傳達過信息後即結束，或者也可以讓法術一直持續並且每當預設條件被觸發時信息都會被復述出來。
觸發條件可以很籠統也可以很具體，由你決定，但你只能根據目標物體30英尺范圍內的視覺或聽覺狀況來設定條件。例如，你可以命令魔嘴在任何生物移動至物體30英尺范圍內時即說出信息，或者當 30 英尺內有銀鈴響起時說出信息。

spell.name: 魔化武器[Magic Weapon]
entries: 你觸摸一柄非魔法武器。該武器變成魔法武器，在攻擊骰和傷害骰上帶有 +1 加值，直到法術終結。

entriesHigherLevel.name: 升環效果
entries: 當你使用 4 環或以上法術位施放此法術時，加值提升到 +2 。 6 環或以上 +3 。

spell.name: 高等幻像[Major Image]

components.m: 少許羊毛

entries: 你創造出一件物體，生物，或其他可視現象的幻象，它必需不大於一個 20 尺邊長的立方體。這幻象出現在射程內的一處地點，持續到時效終。它看上去完全像真，包括恰當的聲音、氣味、溫度。你不能做出足以做成傷害的冷熱效果，也不能做出足以做成雷嗚傷害或使人耳聾巨響，亦不能做出足以使人感到不適的氣味。
只要你在幻像的射程以內，你可以用你的動作將幻象移動到射程內的任一點。當幻象移動時，你可以調整它讓它的移動顯得自然。例如說，如果你做出生物的幻象並移動它，你可以讓它看上去在走路。類似地，你可以讓幻像在不同時候發出不同的聲音，甚至令它進行對話。
任何物理接觸都會揭露它是個幻象，因為物體可以通過它。生物可以用動作去檢查這幻象，以智力（調查）檢定對抗你的法術的豁免難度。能夠辨認出它是幻象的生物也可以看穿它，看得到在它另一面有些甚麼東西，並且幻像的其他感官刺激會衰減。

entriesHigherLevel.name: 升環效果
entries: 當你用 6 環或以上的法術位施放此法術時，法術效果持續到被驅散，不需要你維持專注。

spell.name: Mass Cure Wounds
entries: A wave of healing energy washes out from a point of your choice within range. Choose up to six creatures in a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on that point. Each target regains hit points equal to {@dice 3d8} + your spellcasting ability modifier. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, the healing increases by {@dice 1d8} for each slot level above 5th.

spell.name: Mass Heal
entries: A flood of healing energy flows from you into injured creatures around you. You restore up to 700 hit points, divided as you choose among any number of creatures that you can see within range. Creatures healed by this spell are also cured of all diseases and any effect making them {@condition 盲目[Blinded]} or {@condition 耳聾[Deafened]}. This spell has no effect on undead or constructs.

spell.name: 群體醫療真言[Mass Healing Word]
entries: 選擇射程內你看得見的六名目標，當你咏唱出醫治的真言時他們恢復 {@dice 1d4} + 你的施法能力調整值 的生命值。此法術對不死和構裝無效。

entriesHigherLevel.name: 升環效果
entries: 當你用 4 環或以上的法術位施放此法術時，每環節增加 {@dice 1d4} 恢復量。

spell.name: Mass Suggestion

components.m: a snake's tongue and either a bit of honeycomb or a drop of sweet oil

entries: You suggest a course of activity (limited to a sentence or two) and magically influence up to twelve creatures of your choice that you can see within range and that can hear and understand you. Creatures that can't be {@condition 迷惑[Charmed]} are immune to this effect. The suggestion must be worded in such a manner as to make the course of action sound reasonable. Asking the creature to stab itself, throw itself onto a spear, immolate itself, or do some other obviously harmful act automatically negates the effect of the spell.

Each target must make a Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, it pursues the course of action you described to the best of its ability. The suggested course of action can continue for the entire duration. If the suggested activity can be completed in a shorter time, the spell ends when the subject finishes what it was asked to do.

You can also specify conditions that will trigger a special activity during the duration. For example, you might suggest that a group of soldiers give all their money to the first beggar they meet. If the condition isn't met before the spell ends, the activity isn't performed.
If you or any of your companions damage a creature affected by this spell, the spell ends for that creature.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a 7th-level spell slot, the duration is 10 days. When you use an 8th-level spell slot, the duration is 30 days. When you use a 9th-level spell slot, the duration is a year and a day.

spell.name: Maze
entries: You banish a creature that you can see within range into a labyrinthine demiplane. The target remains there for the duration or until it escapes the maze.

The target can use its action to attempt to escape. When it does so, it makes a DC 20 Intelligence check. If it succeeds, it escapes, and the spell ends (a minotaur or goristro demon automatically succeeds).
When the spell ends, the target reappears in the space it left or, if that space is occupied, in the nearest unoccupied space.

spell.name: 融身入石[Meld into Stone]
entries: 你進入一個大到能完全容納你的身體的石制物體或石材表面內，使你自己和你攜帶的所有裝備在法術持續時間內與石頭融為一體。你可以使用你的移動力（movement）從一個你能接觸到的位置進入石頭中。任何非魔法感官都無法看到或偵測到你的存在到。
與石頭融合後，你看不到外界發生了什麼，並且你為了聆聽外界聲音而進行的任何感知（察覺）檢定都獲得劣勢。當與石頭融合時，你仍能感覺到時間的流逝，也可以對你自己施展法術。你可以使用你的移動力（movement）從你進入石頭的地方離開石頭，這會使法術終止；除此之外你無法移動。
石頭受到的輕微損傷不會對你造成傷害，但石頭的部分損毀或者形狀的改變（改變到不再適合容納你的程度）會將你排出石頭並對你造成 {@dice 6d6} 鈍擊(bludgeoning) 傷害。石頭的完全損毀（或材質的改變）會將你排出石頭並對你造成 50 點鈍擊傷害。如果你被排出石頭，你會摔倒在距你先前進入石頭處最近的位置。

spell.name: 馬友夫強酸箭[Melf's Acid Arrow]

components.m: 大黃葉的粉末和一個虺蛇的胃

entries: 一支閃爍的綠色箭矢迅疾飛向射程內的一個目標，並爆散成酸霧。對目標進行一次遠程法術攻擊，若命中，則目標立即受到 {@dice 4d4} acid 傷害並在它的下一回合結束時受到 {@dice 2d4} acid 傷害。若未命中，則酸液箭矢濺射到了目標，造成初始傷害一半的傷害，並且不會在下一回合結束時造成傷害。

entriesHigherLevel.name: 升環效果
entries: 當你使用 3 環或更高的法術位施展此法術時，每環節使初始傷害和後續傷害額外增加 {@dice 1d4} 。

spell.name: 修復術[Mending]

components.m: 2顆磁鐵石

entries: 這個法術可以修復你接觸到的物體上的一個斷裂或撕裂，比如斷了的鏈條，斷了兩半的鑰匙，撕破的披風，或者漏水的皮囊。只要破損或撕裂在任何尺寸上都不超過1英尺，你就可以修補它，而不會留下以前損壞的痕跡。
這個法術可以物理的修復一個魔法物品或是建築，但無法將魔法屬性回復。

spell.name: 傳訊術[Message]

components.m: 一條短的銅線

entries: 你用你的手指指一個生物然後傳密語給對方，對方也可以用密語與你通話，但只有你可以聽得見。
此法術可以穿牆(1呎後的石牆、1吋厚的金屬、薄的鉛或是3呎的木頭) 此法術不需要直線，它可以環繞。

spell.name: Meteor Swarm
entries: Blazing orbs of fire plummet to the ground at four different points you can see within range. Each creature in a 40-foot-radius sphere centered on each point you choose must make a Dexterity saving throw. The sphere spreads around corners. A creature takes {@dice 20d6} fire damage and {@dice 20d6} bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature in the area of more than one fiery burst is affected only once.
The spell damages objects in the area and ignites flammable objects that aren't being worn or carried.

spell.name: Mind Blank
entries: Until the spell ends, one willing creature you touch is immune to psychic damage, any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts, divination spells, and the {@condition 迷惑[Charmed]} condition. The spell even foils wish spells and spells or effects of similar power used to affect the target's mind or to gain information about the target.

spell.name: 小幻象[Minor Illusion]

components.m: 少許羊毛

entries: 你在射程內造出一度幻聲或幻影，持續到時效結束。如果你用一次動作將它解散或者再次施展此法術，這幻象也會消失。
如果你創造聲音，它的聲量小至低語，大至尖叫。它可以是你的聲音、其他人的聲音、獅子吼叫、一陣鼓聲、或任何其他你喜歡的聲音。聲音可以不衰減地持續到時效結束，你也可以在不同的時間發出斷續的聲音直到法術終結。
如果你創造一件物體的影像，例如椅子、沾泥的足跡、小寶箱等，它必需不大於邊長5 尺的立方體。這影像不會造出聲音、光照、氣味、或任何其他感官效果。任何物理接觸都會揭露它的本質，因為物體可以通過它。
如果有生物花一次動作去查探這聲音或影像，他可以通過一次成功的智力（調查）檢定判斷它是幻象，難度等同你的法術豁免難度。如果有生物能夠辨認出它是幻象，對他而言這幻象會變成半透明。

spell.name: Mirage Arcane
entries: You make terrain in an area up to 1 mile square look, sound, smell, and even feel like some other sort of terrain. The terrain's general shape remains the same, however. Open fields or a road could be made to resemble a swamp, hill, crevasse, or some other difficult or impassable terrain. A pond can be made to seem like a grassy meadow, a precipice like a gentle slope, or a rock-strewn gully like a wide and smooth road.
Similarly, you can alter the appearance of structures, or add them where none are present. The spell doesn't disguise, conceal, or add creatures.

The illusion includes audible, visual, tactile, and olfactory elements, so it can turn clear ground into difficult terrain (or vice versa) or otherwise impede movement through the area. Any piece of the illusory terrain (such as a rock or stick) that is removed from the spell's area disappears immediately.

Creatures with truesight can see through the illusion to the terrain's true form; however, all other elements of the illusion remain, so while the creature is aware of the illusion's presence, the creature can still physically interact with the illusion.

spell.name: 鏡影術[Mirror Image]
entries: 三個你自己的幻象假體出現在你的位置。直到法術結束前，假體會隨你移動、模仿你的動作並變換位置，所以無法追蹤判斷哪一個是你的真身。你可以使用你的動作解消這些幻象假體。
在法術持續時間內，每當一個生物以你為攻擊目標時，骰一個 {@dice d20} 決定該次攻擊擊中的是否是假體。
如果你有 3 個假體，你必須骰出 6 或更高才能使目標的攻擊命中假體。如果你有 2 個假體，你必須骰出 8 或更高。如果你有 1 個假體，你必須骰出 11 或更高。
假體的 AC 等於 10 + 你的敏捷調整值。如果一次攻擊命中了一個假體，該假體就被摧毀。假體只會被一次命中它的攻擊摧毀，它無視所有其他傷害和效果。當三個假體全部被毀時，此法術結束。
如果一個生物無法視物，或者它依靠其它感官例如盲視，或者它可以如同真實視覺一樣洞察幻象，則此法術無法影響該生物。

spell.name: Mislead
entries: You become {@condition invisible} at the same time that an illusory double of you appears where you are standing. The double lasts for the duration, but the invisibility ends if you attack or cast a spell.
You can use your action to move your illusory double up to twice your speed and make it gesture, speak, and behave in whatever way you choose.

You can see through its eyes and hear through its ears as if you were located where it is. On each of your turns as a bonus action, you can switch from using its senses to using your own, or back again. While you are using its senses, you are {@condition 盲目[Blinded]} and {@condition 耳聾[Deafened]} in regard to your own surroundings.

spell.name: 迷霧步[Misty Step]
entries: 你被轉瞬即逝的銀霧圍繞，傳送到你可以看見的一處閒置空間，最遠 30 尺。

spell.name: Modify Memory
entries: You attempt to reshape another creature's memories. One creature that you can see must make a Wisdom saving throw. If you are fighting the creature, it has advantage on the saving throw. On a failed save, the target becomes {@condition 迷惑[Charmed]} by you for the duration. The {@condition 迷惑[Charmed]} target is {@condition 乏力[Incapacitated]} and unaware of its surroundings, though it can still hear you. If it takes any damage or is targeted by another spell, this spell ends, and none of the target's memories are modified.

While this charm lasts, you can affect the target's memory of an event that it experienced within the last 24 hours and that lasted no more than 10 minutes. You can permanently eliminate all memory of the event, allow the target to recall the event with perfect clarity and exacting detail, change its memory of the details of the event, or create a memory of some other event.

You must speak to the target to describe how its memories are affected, and it must be able to understand your language for the modified memories to take root. Its mind fills in any gaps in the details of your description. If the spell ends before you have finished describing the modified memories, the creature's memory isn't altered. Otherwise, the modified memories take hold when the spell ends.

A modified memory doesn't necessarily affect how a creature behaves, particularly if the memory contradicts the creature's natural inclinations, alignment, or beliefs. An illogical modified memory, such as implanting a memory of how much the creature enjoyed dousing itself in acid, is dismissed, perhaps as a bad dream. The DM might deem a modified memory too nonsensical to affect a creature in a significant manner.
A remove curse or greater restoration spell cast on the target restores the creature's true memory.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: If you cast this spell using a spell slot of 6th level or higher, you can alter the target's memories of an event that took place up to 7 days ago (6th level), 30 days ago (7th level), 1 year ago (8th level), or any time in the creature's past (9th level).

spell.name: 月華之光[Moonbeam]

components.m: 幾粒月籽藤的種子和一塊乳白色的長石

entries: 一束淡淡的銀光灑在以射程內一點為中心，5 英尺半徑、 40 英尺高的圓柱區域內。直到法術結束前，圓柱區域內充滿微光。
當一個生物在某一回合第一次進入法術區域，或在法術區域內開始它的回合時，它被幽靈般的火焰吞噬，火焰會引起劇烈的灼痛。該生物必須進行一次體魄豁免，若失敗則受到 {@dice 2d10} radiant 傷害，成功則傷害減半。
變形者（shapechanger）進行此豁免時獲得劣勢，並且如果它豁免失敗，它會立即回復它的原始形態，在它離開此法術的光亮之前它都不可以變形成其他形態。
在你施展此法術之後的每一回合，你都可以使用一個動作將此華光向任意方向移動 60 英尺。

entriesHigherLevel.name: 升環效果
entries: 當你使用 3 環或更高的法術位施展此法術時，每環節傷害增加 {@dice 1d10} 。

spell.name: Mordenkainen's Faithful Hound

components.m: a tiny silver whistle, a piece of bone, and a thread

entries: You conjure a phantom watchdog in an unoccupied space that you can see within range, where it remains for the duration, until you dismiss it as an action, or until you move more than 100 feet away from it.

The hound is {@condition invisible} to all creatures except you and can't be harmed. When a Small or larger creature comes within 30 feet of it without first speaking the password that you specify when you cast this spell, the hound starts barking loudly. The hound sees {@condition invisible} creatures and can see into the Ethereal Plane. It ignores illusions.

At the start of each of your turns, the hound attempts to bite one creature within 5 feet of it that is hostile to you. The hound's attack bonus is equal to your spellcasting ability modifier + your proficiency bonus. On a hit, it deals {@dice 4d8} piercing damage.

spell.name: Mordenkainen's Magnificent Mansion

m.text: a miniature portal carved from ivory, a small piece of polished marble, and a tiny silver spoon, each item worth at least 5 gp

entries: You conjure an extradimensional dwelling in range that lasts for the duration. You choose where its one entrance is located. The entrance shimmers faintly and is 5 feet wide and 10 feet tall. You and any creature you designate when you cast the spell can enter the extradimensional dwelling as long as the portal remains open. You can open or close the portal if you are within 30 feet of it. While closed, the portal is invisible.
Beyond the portal is a magnificent foyer with numerous chambers beyond. The atmosphere is clean, fresh, and warm.

You can create any floor plan you like, but the space can't exceed 50 cubes, each cube being 10 feet on each side. The place is furnished and decorated as you choose. It contains sufficient food to serve a nine course banquet for up to 100 people. A staff of 100 near-transparent servants attends all who enter. You decide the visual appearance of these servants and their attire. They are completely obedient to your orders. Each servant can perform any task a normal human servant could perform, but they can't attack or take any action that would directly harm another creature. Thus the servants can fetch things, clean, mend, fold clothes, light fires, serve food, pour wine, and so on. The servants can go anywhere in the mansion but can't leave it. Furnishings and other objects created by this spell dissipate into smoke if removed from the mansion. When the spell ends, any creatures inside the extradimensional space are expelled into the open spaces nearest to the entrance.

spell.name: Mordenkainen's Private Sanctum

components.m: a thin sheet of lead, a piece of opaque glass, a wad of cotton or cloth, and powdered chrysolite

entries: You make an area within range magically secure. The area is a cube that can be as small as 5 feet to as large as 100 feet on each side. The spell lasts for the duration or until you use an action to dismiss it.
When you cast the spell, you decide what sort of security the spell provides, choosing any or all of the following properties:

items: Sound can't pass through the barrier at the edge of the warded area.
The barrier of the warded area appears dark and foggy, preventing vision (including darkvision) through it.
Sensors created by divination spells can't appear inside the protected area or pass through the barrier at its perimeter.
Creatures in the area can't be targeted by divination spells.
Nothing can teleport into or out of the warded area.
Planar travel is blocked within the warded area.

entries: Casting this spell on the same spot every day for a year makes this effect permanent.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 5th level or higher, you can increase the size of the cube by 100 feet for each slot level beyond 4th. Thus you could protect a cube that can be up to 200 feet on one side by using a spell slot of 5th level.

spell.name: Mordenkainen's Sword

m.text: a miniature platinum sword with a grip and pommel of copper and zinc, worth 250 gp

entries: You create a sword-shaped plane of force that hovers within range. It lasts for the duration.

When the sword appears, you make a melee spell attack against a target of your choice within 5 feet of the sword. On a hit, the target takes {@dice 3d10} force damage. Until the spell ends, you can use a bonus action on each of your turns to move the sword up to 20 feet to a spot you can see and repeat this attack against the same target or a different one.

spell.name: Move Earth

components.m: an iron blade and a small bag containing a mixture of soils—clay, loam, and sand

entries: Choose an area of terrain no larger than 40 feet on a side within range. You can reshape dirt, sand, or clay in the area in any manner you choose for the duration. You can raise or lower the area's elevation, create or fill in a trench, erect or flatten a wall, or form a pillar. The extent of any such changes can't exceed half the area's largest dimension. So, if you affect a 40-foot square, you can create a pillar up to 20 feet high, raise or lower the square's elevation by up to 20 feet, dig a trench up to 20 feet deep, and so on. It takes 10 minutes for these changes to complete.
At the end of every 10 minutes you spend concentrating on the spell, you can choose a new area of terrain to affect.
Because the terrain's transformation occurs slowly, creatures in the area can't usually be trapped or injured by the ground's movement.

This spell can't manipulate natural stone or stone construction. Rocks and structures shift to accommodate the new terrain. If the way you shape the terrain would make a structure unstable, it might collapse.
Similarly, this spell doesn't directly affect plant growth. The moved earth carries any plants along with it.

spell.name: 回避偵測[Nondetection]

m.text: 一撮價值至少 25 gp 的鑽石粉末，撒在目標身上。法術會消耗這些材料

entries: 在持續時間內，你將你接觸的一個目標隱藏起來，遮斷了{@spell 預言[divination]}的偵測。目標可以是一個自願生物或一個地方或一個在各個方向上都不超過 10 英尺的物體。在持續時間內，目標不能成為{@spell 預言[divination]}魔法的目標，也不能通過{@spell 探知[Scrying]}的探測器手段察覺。

spell.name: 涅斯圖魔法靈光[Nystul's Magic Aura]

components.m: 一小塊方形絲綢

entries: 你在你接觸的一個生物或一個物體上設置一個幻術，使得預言法術會揭示出關於該目標的錯誤信息。目標可以是一個自願生物或者是一個未被其他生物攜帶或穿戴的物體。
當你施展此法術時，選擇下列效果中的一個或兩個。效果在持續時間內一直存在。如果你每天都對同一個生物或物體施展此法術且每次都選擇相同的效果，持續 30 天，幻術就會一直存在直到被解除。

entries.name: 虛假靈光
entries: 你改變目標向可以偵測出魔法靈光的法術和魔法效果（例如「偵測魔法」）顯示信息時的方式。你可以使一個非魔法物體顯示出魔法，一個魔法物體顯示出非魔法；或者改變物體的魔法靈光，使它顯示出由你選擇的特定魔法學派的靈光。當你對物體設置此效果時，你可以使這種虛假的魔法向任何使用此物品的生物顯示出來。

entries.name: 偽裝
entries: 你改變目標向偵測生物類別的法術和魔法效果（例如聖武士的「神聖感知」或「徽記術」的觸發條件）顯示信息時的方式。你選擇一種生物類別｛譯者：看後面的意思應該是漏了設定陣營｝，其他的法術和魔法效果會認為生物屬於該類別或者屬於該陣營。

spell.name: Otiluke's Freezing Sphere

components.m: a small crystal sphere

entries: A frigid globe of cold energy streaks from your fingertips to a point of your choice within range, where it explodes in a 60-foot-radius sphere.
